# Dewater Products

> Industrial pipe fittings, valves, couplings, and expansion joints supplier based in Perth, Western Australia. Serving water, wastewater, mining, irrigation, and marine industries across Australia. Authorised distributor for Straub, Orbit, Teekay, BoreFlex, and Defender brands.

## Product Categories

- [Industrial Valves](https://dewaterproducts.com.au/industrial-valves): Butterfly valves, check valves, gate valves, ball valves, float valves, foot valves
- [Pipe Couplings](https://dewaterproducts.com.au/pipe-couplings): Straub and Orbit flexible pipe couplings for joining and repair
- [Expansion Joints](https://dewaterproducts.com.au/expansion-joints): Rubber expansion joints - single sphere, twin sphere, arch styles, PTFE lined
- [Strainers](https://dewaterproducts.com.au/strainers): Y-strainers, basket strainers, duplex strainers, suction strainers
- [Pipe Repair](https://dewaterproducts.com.au/pipe-repair): Pipe repair clamps and muff couplings

## Brands

- [Straub Couplings](https://dewaterproducts.com.au/straub-couplings): Swiss-engineered grip and sealing couplings
- [Orbit Couplings](https://dewaterproducts.com.au/orbit-couplings): Flexible pipe couplings including Flex-Grip range
- [Teekay](https://dewaterproducts.com.au/teekay): Pipe couplings and connectors
- [BoreFlex Rubber](https://dewaterproducts.com.au/bore-flex): Rubber expansion joints
- [Defender Valves](https://dewaterproducts.com.au/defender-valves): Industrial valves
- [Defender Strainers](https://dewaterproducts.com.au/defender-strainers): Industrial strainers

## Industries Served

- [Water & Wastewater](https://dewaterproducts.com.au/industries/water-wastewater): Municipal water treatment and distribution
- [Mining](https://dewaterproducts.com.au/industries/mining): Dewatering and slurry applications
- [Irrigation](https://dewaterproducts.com.au/industries/irrigation): Agricultural water systems
- [Fire Services](https://dewaterproducts.com.au/industries/fire-services): Fire protection systems
- [Marine](https://dewaterproducts.com.au/industries/marine): Shipboard and offshore applications
- [HVAC](https://dewaterproducts.com.au/industries/hvac): Heating, ventilation, air conditioning
- [Food & Beverage](https://dewaterproducts.com.au/industries/food-beverage): Food-grade applications
